Room.Name: Secret Quick Car Transporter
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the quick car transporter room for the City of Hafnia.
Room.LongDescription: The elves used quick cars to get around the mountain quickly and efficiently. Powered by gravity and literally no friction, quick cars can travel between cities in a matter of seconds. Hold on, though. These cars can travel at speeds up to 200 miles per hour. And who knows where you'll end up.
